content: To defeat the Earth Rakshasa, hang back and wait until the enemy charges you. Dodge to the side just before the attack hits and quickly run back to hit it in the back and damage the Earth Rakshasa's body instead of its shield. It can be difficult to get around the shield, but casting Immobilize makes it much easier if you're struggling.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Rakshasa_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Rakshasa Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Rakshasa Fight'.
The content is as follows:
To defeat the Earth Rakshasa, hang back and wait until the enemy charges you. Dodge to the side just before the attack hits and quickly run back to hit it in the back and damage the Earth Rakshasa's body instead of its shield. It can be difficult to get around the shield, but casting Immobilize makes it much easier if you're struggling.
